title: is 1700 rank in pessat sufficient for ECE at RR campus?

comments.body: For ECE you're better of going to EC campus, especially if you want to make a career in ece
Alright i am in sem 5 but i am curious as to why u say that, ece in ec btw ðŸ‘€

Idk man , i am ec campus ece, teachers there's a few who are great but ummm short tempered and everything negative u could ask for , some are great and good some are terrible, mark wise they won't give u a single marks , cs ik ppl who got even full on the internals this time my max was 27/30 when i did everything perfectly, attendance wise they didn't care for the last 2 sems for us , 
Teachers i rate 8/10, they are all smart, atleast most of them, some have a bad temper but well u can't have everything good can u
The entire faculty has graduated from IISc or have studied there and have more industry presence than RR campus.
nah man, theres someone who is but not the entire faculty , who said u this lol. industry presence yes idk if more than rr cause never been to rr
I was in RR and shifted to EC after seeing the disparity
